Endeavour Mining bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'ọtụtụ mba nke nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ na Côte d'Ivoire, Burkina Faso na Senegal
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ isi na London, England, ma gafere na London Stock Exchange na United Kingdom, Toronto Stock Exchange na Canada, na Over-The-Counter na United States
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke FTSE 100 Index.
lọ ọrụ ahụ, nke otu ndị Neil Woodyer duziri guzobere dị ka Endeavour Financial na'afọ 988, dịgasị iche site na ego na-egwupụta ihe na ọrụ na mmalite narị afọ nke 21.
Ọ nwetara Etruscan Resources (gụnyere ebe a na-egwupụta ihe n'Agbou na Côte d'Ivoire) na June 2010.
Endeavor kwuputara na June 2017 na ọ ga-azụta Avnel Gold Mining Limited maka nde C$159
Avnel nwere mmasị 80% na ọrụ Kalana Gold na Mali na ikike nyocha na gburugburu ar..
Woodyer kwụsịrị dị ka onye isi oche ma were Sébastien de Montessus dochie ya na Mee 2016.
N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara Semafo maka ebe a na-egwupụta ọlaedo Mana na Boungou na Burkina Faso.
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2021, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara Teranga Gold Corporation maka ebe a na-egwupụta ọla edo ya na Sabodala-Massawa na Senegal na ebe a na-egwu ọla edo Wahgnion na Burkina Faso.
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nọ n'okpuru onyinye mbụ ọha na eze na London Stock Exchange na June 2021.
